Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2017 12:42AM Poohbear2010 wrote: good evening, Drained, I was diagnosed with HER2gene positive stage 2-3 grade 2 in 2006, I was told the same thing about it being low to come back..I don't want to dis allusion you but I had triple negative in the other breast within 4years...so I would take the Chemo. I will pray for you...it's a hard road but you just have to persevere  ...good luck Judy
